title: The 2015 ranked season draws to a close

replies.body: "Invite and friend request flair" What is flair? Sorry I am noob. Don't hit me. Pls.
A little badge that appears on the top left of the invite/friend request notification, to show you what rank they are assuming they made gold or higher this season.
You mean, August 10th for the eligibility not, July 10th. Close but Graves still has no cigar, RIP rito's math's.
Nice catch, fixed!
I'd be excited for the rewards if I was good lmao {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
I'd be excited for the rewards if victorious sivir was good ; w ; lmao{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

Before I read this page, I read another thing saying that rewards will be sent out within 12 hours of preseason launch.  However here it says "Rewards will arrive by the end of day on November 17th"  Is this true?  Or is it just accidentally typed wrong?

So next season, are you guys going to completely reset the scores for the lower tiers? I'm getting kind of tired of winning 5 or 6 out of 10 placement matches and only getting Bronze 5 (even when I ended in Bronze 3 or 2).... the first time I played ranked I won 4/10 and got Bronze 1. 
I know your reasons for why it is the way it is, but in truth, bad players will always filter down. And doing a complete reset for tiers like Bronze or Silver will give good (or relatively good) players a better chance to advance.
i carried myself out of Bronze 5 to Silver 5 last season, and this season Bronze 4 to Silver 4, it's not that hard, you just have to prove bronze that you're good {{champion:119}}
went from bronze 4 to plat this season
You were also lucky. And good.

I say beating bronze is easy, but trying to beat bronze in a 3v5 because your getting trolled or a platinum/ diamond smurf is helping a bronze mate get out of bronze can normally be quite difficult to verse.
you can't win them all
That's very true, but you get some people who try just to hard, like over the top.
You were lucky.
Just learn the game, u probably say all of this yet still havent bought a ward in your life. I went from B4-G5 this season just because i learnt how the actual game works

More like, I'm the only one buying wards, the only one using my trinket, and by the end of the game, the only one with a positive K:D ratio... Not because I'm a coward or troll or only caring about my score, but because I seem to be the only person who thinks going in 2 v 5 when they have 3 levels on us is a bad idea. I'm not saying I'm Challenger, I'm just saying you can only carry trash for so long before the bag rips (it's a metaphor, not being toxic).

I've gotten so close to getting out of Bronze on a number of occasions, but it's frustrating when I have to start all over again when the season ends. That's the point I'm trying to make; I shouldn't have to start from the bottom when I was close to getting out. Give us an even chance.

I on my smurf, try my best to lose the first 10 placement matches, and get from bronze 5 to gold 5 in 30-40 games with only 16 champions, anyone who is stuck in bronze has brain damage, saying that your team mates are the reason you lose is absurd, playing vs bronzes is like playing vs bots, u can't lose unless u don't have a mouse.
instead of complaining work on yourself, learn the game and accept that if you die that is your fault
Teach my your ways, Senpai.
Be Good and unique knowing your champion's potential and efficiently use it
This sounds like an awesome idea! Only problem is it might actually disadvantage people because "bad" players get lucky and get put higher than they belong. It'd be very fiddly to try and figure out.
Yes I'm not a shitty bronze. I'm a shitty silver.
I'm glad im in Platinum
this sucks back in season 3 u need to reach plat division to have victorious J4 and janna {{item:3151}}
First they didn't class using divisions back then it was elo and second it was seasons 1/2 not 3

I HAVENT YET received my rewards.... I believe i do not fall under any of these :
Yes, some players are ineligible for rewards because of negative in-game behavior. This applies only to the 2015 season. Here are the details:
Players with bans or chat/ranked restrictions active when the season ends are ineligible for this year’s rewards
_**> ~~Players banned for seven days or more in the three months prior to the end of the season (August 10) are ineligible for this year’s rewards.~~**_
Players banned for boosting during the 2015 season remain ineligible for rewards
Players who experienced fraud-related and erroneous bans will still be eligible

i was banned but that was like ages ago so i believe i should be getting the rewards plz help me out

Don't worry, rewards roll out until end of the day on the 17th.If you haven't received your rewards by then, contact riot support. U probs already have your rewards already so me typing this is pointless haha
No i havent yet received any rewards..... and im getting all concerned abt this :(

What I don't get is I get 7 points for a win and loose 22 points for a loss, so why is riot making me have to win 75% of my games just to go from b4 to b3 when not even the best champ win ratios are about 50somethin % . This is what is needed to be fixed. I mean I got over 600 ranked wins at 49.4% and I'm still b5/4, do I really need to get 75% to get out of bronze?

to gain mmr you need to win games, in other words until you have a positive win rate, like 55% or something, you can't gain decent lp because you're too far below your current division. If you want to gain lp, in some ways it's worth making a new account because your default mmr would be higher than what you currently have.

Winning games raises your mmr and in doing so you gain more lp by having more mmr.

But it's also based on the mmr difference between each team,

A helpful website might be op.gg which while not 100% accurate can give you an idea of how far off mmrwise you are from regular lp gain.

The problem tldr, is that your mmr is below the average bronze 5 so you can rank up because you're seen as below deserving to rank up.
Can we still play ranked and rank up during the "off-season" ? sorry im new to LOL ranked
Yes

I think the ranking system isn't good. More than 64% people are in bronze/silver, truly, a lot of these people don't belong there. Don't we want MORE people getting gold, feeling happy about their victorious skins? Plz make climbing easier. plzplz <3

They are. Next season they are implementing easier promos - if you fail your promos once, the next time you start promos again you also start with one free win, and this will make a huuuuuuge difference for some (like me I failed my promos to s5 like 4 times lol). Climbing will definitely be easier in Season 6.
So after finaly getting out of bronze with a bit of raging so happy to get championship siver I cant get it Riot please I tried and tried and finaly got here can I please still get the skin
Go seek a lawyer. ;) Trust me.
Hey i was wondering when we get our rank team rewards, Like the icon ect

"Players who experienced fraud-related and erroneous bans will still be _**eligible**_" 

does that mean people who got accounts off fraud will still get rewards? or the people that were frauded of their accounts will still get rewards, not too clear.
